channel.title: Need help , please
channel.description:
I need help with a few things but everyone knows and won't share.
(all based on moparscape)
1. i would like to make my self the admin of my server but can't find this "client.java" everybodys talking about.
2. i would like to add monsters to my server, but need a step to step.
3. i would like to make it so only mods and admins can use ::pickup XXXX XX - but don't know how and i'm not an admin yet...
:( :( :( hope you can help :( :( :( please email me the help you have to offer - don't mind if you don't , just easier for me.

item.title: Need help , please
item.dc:creator: @chrishead168 Chrishead168
item.description:
@chrishead168 wrote:

your useing the HYBRIDSCAPE source that comes with moparscape. Try going to the download section and getting a testscape source then look throught a few tuts untill you get compile and run to work then just add things useing tuts again.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help , please

item.description:
@dogie325 wrote:

I need help with a few things but everyone knows and won’t share.

  1. i would like to make my self the admin of my server but can’t find this “client.java” everybodys talking about.

hope you can help
please email me the help you have to offer - don’t mind if you don’t , just easier for me.
